r.s: A Windows specific extension to allow PHP to interact with Windows Services.
r.d: The win32service extension is a Windows specific extension that allows PHP to communicate with the Service Control Manager to start, stop, register and unregister services, and even allows your PHP scripts to run as a service.
r.n: * Add win32_send_custom_control, win32_set_service_exit_mode and win32_set_service_exit_code functions. * Add severals constants. * Add many configuration option for win32_create_service function. The binary is also available here: https://github.com/win32service/win32service/releases/tag/v0.4.0
